name: Shimano XT SM-CRM85 12 Speed Chainring
description: Shimano XT quality to complete your 1x12 speed drivetrain. Steel and aluminum composite construction keeps weight down without sacrificing stiffness and durability.Shimano Dynamic Chain Engagement+ technology uses a special tooth profile is designed to improve chain retention and engagement, improving your drivetrain’s efficiency.Designed to be paired with the FC-M8100, FC-M8120, FC-M8130 cranksets.Compatible with 1x12 speed drivetrains.
